Accessibility

Accessibility

business.gov.au aims to meet the Australian Government standard for web accessibility. We want our information to be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or ability.

We’re committed to making business.gov.au as accessible and usable as possible.

We’ve designed our website to meet the Australian Government Digital Service Standard. This includes meeting the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.0 (WCAG 2.0) standard at level AA.

We acknowledge the traditional owners of the country throughout Australia and their continuing connection to land, sea and community. We pay our respect to them and their cultures and to the elders past and present.
